title: First Blog Post
content: Hello! This is an entry for my first blog post. This is mainly just a test, I am trying to debug some issues I have been having with the code. I think I have fixed it for now. Originally, I was planning on using an SQL file to store the data nad parse it with python but I decided to go with JSON instead since it would be easier. If I end up with way too many posts then I might have to switch to postgresql, but for now I'll have to bare with this. I'll also work on the css and layout of this page later. I'm really tired. I might reuse this code for my update log, too. I'll have to tweak it a bit though.
